title: State-Sponsored Terrorism, Crimes, and Lies - C. 23 (Russia 3)
description:
State-Sponsored Terrorism, Crimes, and Lies - Collection 23 (Russia 3):

We have 35 titles here:

-  Andrew - The World Was Going Our Way; the KGB and the Battle for the Third World (2005)

-  Arutunyan - The Putin Mystique; Inside Russia's Power Cult (2014)

-  Astrov (Ed.) - The Great Power (mis)Management; the Russian-Georgian War and Its Implications for Global Political Order (2011)

-  Bardach & Gleeson - Man Is Wolf to Man; Surviving the Gulag (1998)

-  Black - The Russian Presidency of Dmitry Medvedev, 2008-12; the Next Step Forward or Merely a Time Out (2015)

-  Conquest - Kolyma; the Arctic Death Camps (1979)

-  Dawisha - Putin's Kleptocracy; Who Owns Russia (2014)

-  Dolot - Execution by Hunger; the Hidden Holocaust (1985)

-  Figes - Just Send Me Word; a True Story of Love and Survival in the Gulag (2012)

-  Galeotti - Russia's Wars in Chechnya, 1994-2009 (2014)

-  Gellately - Lenin, Stalin and Hitler; the Age of Social Catastrophe (2007)

-  Goldfarb & Litvinenko - Death of Dissident; the Poisoning of Alexander Litvenenko and the Return of the KGB  (2007)

-  Goldman - Inventing the Enemy; Denunciation and Terror in Stalin's Russia (2011)

-  Goldman - Petrostate; Putin, Power, and the New Russia (2008)

-  Graham - Lonely Ideas; Can Russia Compete (2013)

-  Haynes & Husan - A Century of State Murder; Death and Policy in Twentieth Century Russia (2003)

-  HRW - Positively Abandoned; Stigma and Discrimination against HIV-Positive Mothers and their Children in Russia (2005)

-  HRW - Torture, Forced Disappearances and Killings in Chechnya (2002)

-  HRW - Who Will Tell Me What Happened to My Son; Russia's Implementation of European Court of Human Rights Judgments on Chechnya (2009)

-  Kern - A Death in Washington; Walter G. Krivitsky and the Stalin Terror (2004)

-  Khlevniuk - Master of the House; Stalin and His Inner Circle (2009)

-  Lewin - The Soviet Century (2005)

-  Marshall - The Caucasus Under Soviet Rule (2010)

-  McFaul - Russia's Unfinished Revolution; Political Change from Gorbachev to Putin (2001)

-  Merridale - Red Fortress; History and Illusion in the Kremlin (2013)

-  Mochulsky - Gulag Boss; a Soviet Memoir (2011)

-  Moorhouse - The Devil's Alliance; Hitler's Pact with Stalin, 1939-1941 (2014)

-  Pirani - Change in Putin's Russia; Power, Money and People (2010)

-  Pomerantsev - Nothing Is True and Everything Is Possible; the Surreal Heart of the New Russia (2014)

-  Snetkov - Russia's Security Policy under Putin; a Critical Perspective (2015)

-  Sperling - Sex, Politics, & Putin; Political Legitimacy in Russia (2015)
 
-  Stent - The Limits of Partnership; U.S.-Russian Relations in the Twenty-First Century (2014)

-  Tsygankov - The Strong State in Russia; Development and Crisis (2014)

-  White (Ed.) - Politics and the Ruling Group in Putin's Russia (2008)

-  Zubok - A Failed Empire; the Soviet Union in the Cold War from Stalin to Gorbachev (2007)
